name: Vladyslav Fokin
summary: Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience in JavaScript/TypeScript, React.ts, Next.js, and SEO. Initially started as an SEO Specialist before advancing into full stack development.

experience.seo: Analyzed websites and online stores, optimized content for search engines, developed strategies to boost organic traffic, and monitored SEO metrics for improved visibility.
experience.developer: Developed web apps with JavaScript/TypeScript, React.ts, and Next.js. Implemented front-end/back-end features, API integration, and authentication with Firebase/OAuth, leveraging libraries to enhance functionality.
